title: Trump official shares shocking update about the migrant kids saved from the pot farm owned by a Gavin Newsom donor

title: Tom Homan puts smug reporter in her place over why ICE agents are forced to wear masks

author: Brodigan
description: For round 2 of Talking With People on President Donald Trump’s immigration policies, we ran into…this guy. And he sure had a lot to say about it. The only thing we know for sure is he’s 100%, absolutely, definitely (not) gay.
title: A Gay Lib and A Straight Conservative Debate Deporting Illegals | Talking with People

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Someone should really inform the left that you can teach children to respect all people without pushing the sexual preferences of a fraction of the population, but that is besides the point. The most important thing learned from this video is that “there is no gay word for the letter ‘m.’”

A TikTok video has made the rounds on social media after two lesbians expressed their concern over the number of LGBTQ books for children at Barnes & Noble. This includes books like "The Gay BCs" and "Bye Bye, Binary.”

Two lesbians are appalled by the gay propaganda books in the children’s section at Barne
title: Even these lesbians are shocked at the woke indoctrination going on in the kids' bookstore
